1.name: Monitor for my own knowledge
1.goodChoiceIf: You want to keep track of symptom frequency for your own knowledge

1.name: Monitor for my doctor
1.goodChoiceIf: Your doctor wants more detailed symptom or treatment information

1.name: Monitor for insurance
1.goodChoiceIf: Your insurance needs more detailed symptom information to cover your prescription

2.name: Learn migraine frequency
2.goodChoiceIf: You want to know how often you experience symptoms (or pursue treatment)

2.name: Learn what factors may contribute to symptoms
2.goodChoiceIf: You want to identify potential contributors ("triggers")

2.name: Learn whether a specific change affects symptoms
2.goodChoiceIf: You are making a specific change (like starting a new treatment or eliminating a potential contributor) and want to see how it affects your symptoms
